description: If ever a tank top summed up what they're all about, the Wicked Tech™ Tank serves up adventure-ready performance with a sustainable construction. Made with 100% recycled polyester that's durable and easy on the environment, this lightweight, moisture-wicking top dries in a flash and protects against harmful rays thanks to its UPF 50 fabric.
name: Mountain Hardwear Wicked Tech Tank - Mens
